comments: sigma_1(n) is the sum of the divisors of n [same as sigma(n)] (A000203).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..800
prog: (MAGMA) [ q: n in [1..20000] | r eq 0 where q, r is Quotrem(SumOfDivisors(n), EulerPhi(n)) ]; [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 09 2008]
